definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

sentences.english: Rhona Rogers had been friends with Sally Thompson for more than 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 罗娜“罗杰斯和萨莉”汤姆逊是20多年的朋友了。

sentences.english: J. J. Thompson, model. Rutherford, experimental data.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆逊，模型，卢瑟福，数据。

sentences.english: He far preferred Rutherford to Thompson.
sentences.chinese: 相比汤姆逊他更喜欢卢瑟福。

sentences.english: Now let's invite Prof. Tomson to speak to us.
sentences.chinese: 现在请汤姆逊教授讲话。

sentences.english: The operation remained focused on traditional cathode-ray-tube TVs until this year.
sentences.chinese: 但汤姆逊直到今年仍专注于传统的阴极射线管电视机。

definition: Sir Hiram Maxim (1840-1916), American British inventor of the Maxim machine gun
Rutherford (name)/Ernest Rutherford (1871-1937), early nuclear physicist from New Zealand
Edwin Hubble (1889-1953), US astronomer/Fritz Haber (1868-1934), German chemist
Hook or Hooke (name)/Robert Hooke (1635-1703), brilliant English experimental scientist and inventor
rifle (loanword)/also written 來復槍|来复枪
